function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate surveillance of disease outbreaks in residential communities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unrestricted access to disease data for public use may pose a risk of misinterpretation or misrepresentation, leading to panic or false conclusions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of non-peer-reviewed data for clinical practice may result in incorrect or harmful medical decisions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Customization of dashboards and tracking of other countries may lead to biased data analysis or reporting, misrepresenting the true state of the outbreak.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High death rates in specific cities and regions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exponential growth of cases in multiple countries","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in data formats and potential api failure","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interactive web apps providing access to covid-19 data without coding.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Forecast model predicting high death toll.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreasing linear daily percent changes in confirmed cases and deaths in china.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Direct access to real-time epidemiological data can lead to misinformation and panic if the data is not accurate or properly interpreted.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of new variants of sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of detailed viral surveillance at the genomic level","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of mutation and evolution of sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixing measles, mumps, and rubella mmr vaccine to test for broad-spectrum viral immunity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of drugs with potential side effects for covid-19 treatment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Knowledge gaps in understanding covid-19 and its differences from other viruses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infection of workers in slaughterhouses","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of live virus in seafood markets","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Traces of sars-cov-2 rna in sewage water samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission through respiratory droplets and airborne routes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misunderstanding of environmental stability","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Elderly population at higher risk of infection and mortality due to degeneration of immunity.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Children at risk of severe symptoms due to kawasaki syndrome and artery diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher infection rate in younger population due to insufficient social distancing and mask protection.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased thrombotic and micro-vascular complications in severe covid-19 patients, leading to covid-19-associated coagulopathy cac","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Invasion of the central nervous system by sars-cov-2, leading to neurological complications","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Active infection of the digestive system by sars-cov-2, leading to gastrointestinal symptoms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of sars-cov-2 infection mechanism and viral properties.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Multi-organ infection and complications caused by sars-cov-2.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in t cell apoptosis in covid-19 patients","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Creation of pathogenic strains through synthetic biology","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identification of patient zero","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mutations leading to increased infectivity and immune evasion","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unclear research on virus origin","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential intermediate hosts in animal species","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contaminated water or environment as a source of infection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of vectors and their behavior leading to ineffective control measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of cross-border collaboration leading to uncoordinated efforts in disease control","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited vector control methods leading to ineffective disease control","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on single vector control tools leading to unsustainable disease control measures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of funding and weak programmatic capacity","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Environmental change, insecticide resistance, and population growth","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate vector control measures leading to the maintenance of robust disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Historic examples of ’military-like’ vector control lacking community engagement","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Call for strengthening vector control following the zika epidemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of collaboration with non-health sectors in vector control","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate development and testing of novel vector control tools","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emergence of insecticide resistance in anopheles and aedes vectors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
